version.description: Version number, using the development or modification date

arg.description: Configure parameters of the test case according to actual needs

interface.description: For example, configure information such as the MAC address and IPv4 address of the interface.

comments.arg: Specific parameters generated according to the test case, such as configuring information like the MAC address and IPv4 address of the interface.
comments.dut: Name of the device under test, indicating that the test case targets DeviceA.
comments.dut_cfg: Scripts required for the device under test, including the configuration script (DeviceA_Setup) and cleanup script (DeviceA_Teardown) for DeviceA.
comments.port: Ports of the device under test required for the test case; this example includes PortDeviceA_1 and PortDeviceA_2.
